response.improvementExplanation: This map() operation splits each line of text into a list of words. This is a batching operation that can be performed more efficiently at the partition level using mapPartitions(). By processing multiple lines at once, we can reduce the number of function calls and improve I/O performance.
response.mapPartitionsEquivalent: mapPartitions(lambda partition: map(lambda line: line.split(' '), partition))
response.benefits: Reduced function call overhead, optimized I/O, and improved resource utilization.
